description: {"blocks":[{"key":"biidd","text":"Primers targeting various regions of the V. Cholera genome were obtained from the literature or designed, and optimized for a multiplex nested PCR assay. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h3u7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fml96","text":"The following primers were extracted from Hoshino et al., 1998: O1_rfbFor_Inner (modified here by Dr Alex Shaw), O1_rfbRev_Inner, O139_rfbFor_Inner, O139_rfbRev_Outer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ni15","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3a3oh","text":"The following primers were obtained from Theron et al., 2000: ctxA Inner Rev, ctxA_rev. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13edt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"esq03","text":"The following primers were obtained from Nandi et al., 2000: ctxA_For, ompW_For, ompW_Rev, ompW_Inner_Rev. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f8p9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjo5","text":"The following primers were designed by Dr Alex Shaw and are unpublished:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ibtk","text":"ToxR_For_Outer, Tox_Rev_Outer, ToxR_For_Inner, O1_rfbFor_Outer, O1_rfbRev_Outer, O139_rfbFor_Outer, O139_rfbRev_Outer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q1ab","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5oj25","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aeq08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63j79","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bv57","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"abh47","text":"Katsuaki Hoshino, Shinji Yamasaki, Asish K. Mukhopadhyay, Soumen Chakraborty, Arnab Basu, Sujit K. Bhattacharya, G.
